architectural_notes: Weekly timetable table should keep the first (day/date) column fixed during horizontal scroll (e.g., CSS position: sticky; left: 0; proper background and z-index) to prevent overlap.
known_issues: Weekly prayer times view: when times are scrolled left/right, columns overlap and day/date text becomes unreadable.

existing_features.title: Fix the Weekly Prayer Times table on mobile so horizontal scrolling does not cause the left Day/Date column to visually overlap/merge with the time columns; the left column must remain readable and visually separated while scrolling.

Ensure the Weekly Prayer Times sticky-column styling is consistent for both header and body cells (layering, background treatment, and separator), preventing any header/body mismatch or z-index issues during horizontal scroll.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix weekly prayer times table: day/date column overlaps with times when horizontally scrolling; make first column sticky so text remains readable

projectName: Fix weekly prayer times table overlap by making Day/Date column sticky during horizontal scroll
